fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Glitch Manipulation**: Choose a player each night. You can manipulate their technology, causing any action they perform that night to have a 50% chance of failing or targeting a random player instead.
- **Malware Injection**: On even nights, you can choose a player to inject with malware. This player's abilities will be disabled on the following day and night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- **Technological Surge**: During Tuesdays and Fridays, your abilities become empowered. Glitch Manipulation has a 75% chance of causing the target's actions to backfire completely. Malware Injection will disable the target's abilities for two consecutive nights.
- **Surveillance Expert**: You can hear whispers between players at all times, gaining valuable information that may aid your faction.
